| icon           = poe2 necklace_03 icon.png
| description    = This necklace is crafted from the teeth of an aumaua sage. Some of the more superstitious Huana tribes believe that a person's learned wisdom is held not in the mind or heart, but their teeth. This small fetish may hold some understanding.

| location       = * This can be given to you by the Old Druid in the Upoho Wharo Woods. He is rather sceptical towards people from the cities but when you mention that you are chasing a god who will destroy his lands if you don't succeed (requires [Survival](/survival/) 3) he will hand it over to you.
| guid           =3fcc9967-8ffe-41bb-80db-d9c19e2b2220
